授業目的: Students are to be provided the opportunities to explore in depth the theories and concepts related to the field of finance with special emphasis on areas related to corporate finance, risk management, insurance and risk finance.
到達目標: Students will be are able to explore by themselves the theories and concepts related to the field of finance with special emphasis on such areas as corporate finance, risk management, insurance and risk finance.  Students are also able to write an academic paper at the level that they can present it in academic conferences.
